text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion

──Yes, I am deeply honored.
I will gladly accept.

…!
But then, Mayuzumi and Izumi──!

…Yes. We will contact you again separately.
…Excuse me.

──What's wrong?
You seem pretty serious.

…!
Fuyuko... Did you overhear that?

I didn't understand what it was about at all,
Except that it involved Fuyuko and Mei.

…Actually, Asahi won an award at a music awards show.
It will be broadcasted on a prime-time music program.

Oh, that's amazing!
And?

Fuyuko and Mei have also received requests to appear together...
As part of the performance before Asahi's solo stage.

…
They're there to support Asahi, huh?

It's such a great opportunity.
There's no reason to turn it down.

I don't really understand what you're worried about,
But it must be something pretty serious for Fuyuko.

…To refuse because of feeling pathetic...
Would only make you feel even more pathetic.

…I see.
I'll confirm with Mei, but that seems to be Fuyuko's answer.

...They probably call her a monster,
thinking she's something like that.

Ignore what others think, and head straight towards what
you believe in... …It's too dazzling... I can't bear to watch.

…Certainly, Asahi has something special about her.
But Fuyuko and Mei are special in their own ways too.

They're just not like Asahi.
I want everyone to know that.
…Ah, I see.

(What...
Fuyuko's special...?)
